availability.p: Published under a Creative Commons Attribution ShareAlike 3.0 License

div.head: Description of changes for 2011.10
div.p: TESTThis is the first public version of this text. It is a draft built from a comparision of the Reims, Vatican, St. Victor, and Sorbonne manuscript witnesses. A pprovisional apparatus has been constructed to reflect variants between these manuscripts. Corrections and additions and general proof reading of the text and apparatus still need to be completed. Some citations have been added, but further citations and cross-references still need to be added. This version is roughly iidentical to a version marked 0.2 in an alternative versioning scheme, now depreciated.
